title: Cash Course: The Right Way To Save Money

media:group.media:title: Cash Course: The Right Way To Save Money
media:group.media:description:
It’s never too early to start saving money and making fiscally responsible decisions that will last a lifetime. In this episode, middle and high school students will learn why they should save, the purpose of opening a savings account, and how they can save for their futures.

Cash Course is a fun and educational show highlighting the importance of money management and financial literacy for grades 6+.

Watch more episodes and subscribe at https://www.prageru.com/series/financial-literacy-cash-course
